        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Coping with a National Disaster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fertig werden mit einem nationalen Unfall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faire face à un désastre national</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lidar com um disastre nacional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Facendo fronte ad un disastro nazionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιμετώπιση μιας εθνικής καταστροφής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El hacer frente a un desastre nacional</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson plan offers the teacher some tools for coping with the day after a disaster.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kaddish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">national disaster</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">tools</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">feelings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Lektionplan bietet dem Lehrer einige 
Hilfsmittel für das Fertig werden mit dem Tag nach einem Unfall an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce plan de leçon offre au professeur quelques 
outils pour faire face au jour après un désastre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta planta da lição oferece ao professor 
algumas ferramentas para lidar com o dia após um disastre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma di lezione offre all'insegnante 
alcuni strumenti per fare fronte al giorno dopo un disastro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το σχέδιο μαθήματος προσφέρει στο δάσκαλο 
μερικά εργαλεία για την ημέρα μετά από μια καταστροφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este plan de la lección ofrece a profesor algunas
herramientas para hacer frente al día después de un desastre.</string>
          </description>
